abstract: United States prepares arms embargo against South Sudan aimed at curbing violence in brutal civil war; move reflects impatience with leaders of country's warring factions and follows United Nations warnings about potential genocide; Russia and China, who has peacekeeping force on ground, express resistance to sanctions.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Targets South Sudan for Embargo
headline.main: U.S., in Shift, Backs Arms Embargo for South Sudan as Genocide Risk Rises

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The American ambassador to the United Nations signaled the change of position to help stop the violence convulsing the world’s youngest country....
lead_paragraph: The American ambassador to the United Nations signaled the change of position to help stop the violence convulsing the world’s youngest country.
